Just add a underlink prefix and postfix to version

{{{
rake _0.8.7_ -V
rake _0.9.2_ -V
}}}

Here is the source code:
{{{
require 'rubygems'

version = ">= 0"

if ARGV.first =~ /^_(.*)_$/ and Gem::Version.correct? $1 then
  version = $1
  ARGV.shift
end

gem 'rake', version
load Gem.bin_path('rake', 'rake', version)
}}}
